casebody.data:
Korey BOSSIER
v.
Mark GARBER, et al. NO. 2019-C-0146 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 15, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF LAFAYETTE WRIT GRANTED. For the reasons set forth in the dissent, the ruling of the Court of Appeal is reversed. The judgment of the trial court granting the defendants' exceptions and dismissing the plaintiff's claims with prejudice is reinstated. REVERSED AND RENDERED. JOHNSON, C.J., would deny.

HUGHES, J., would deny.

WEIMER, J., would grant and docket.
